00232 void RangeServer::initialize(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr) {
00233   String top_dir;
00234 
00235   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers")) {
00236     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable"))
00237       m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable");
00238     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable/servers");
00239   }
00240 
00241   top_dir = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + m_location;
00242 
00247   uint32_t lock_status;
00248   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00249   HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00250 
00251   m_existence_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(top_dir.c_str(), oflags, null_callback);
00252 
00253   while (true) {
00254 
00255     lock_status = 0;
00256 
00257     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_existence_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &m_existence_file_sequencer);
00258 
00259     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED)
00260       break;
00261 
00262     cout << "Waiting for exclusive lock on hyperspace:/" << top_dir << " ..." << endl;
00263     poll(0, 0, 5000);
00264   }
00265 
00266   Global::log_dir = top_dir + "/log";
00267 
00271   std::string path;
00272   try { 
00273     path = Global::log_dir + "/user";
00274     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(path);
00275     path = Global::log_dir + "/range_txn";
00276     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(path);
00277   }
00278   catch (Exception &e) {
00279     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem creating commit log directory '%s': %s",
00280                path.c_str(), e.what());
00281   }
00282 
00283   if (Global::verbose)
00284     cout << "log_dir=" << Global::log_dir << endl;
00285 
00286 }

00292 void RangeServer::local_recover() {
00293   String meta_log_fname = Global::log_dir + "/range_txn/0.log";
00294   RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr rsml_reader;
00295   CommitLogReaderPtr root_log_reader_ptr;
00296   CommitLogReaderPtr metadata_log_reader_ptr;
00297   CommitLogReaderPtr user_log_reader_ptr;
00298 
00299   try {
00300 
00304     if ( Global::log_dfs->exists(meta_log_fname) ) {
00305 
00306       // Load range states
00307       rsml_reader = new RangeServerMetaLogReader(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00308       const RangeStates &range_states = rsml_reader->load_range_states();
00309 
00313       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA_ROOT;
00314 
00315       // clear the replay map
00316       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00317 
00318       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00319         if (i->table.id == 0 && i->range.end_row && !strcmp(i->range.end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)) {
00320           HT_EXPECT(i->transactions.empty(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00321           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00322         }
00323       }
00324 
00325       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00326         root_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root");
00327         replay_log(root_log_reader_ptr);
00328         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);        
00329       }
00330 
00331       // Create root log and wake up anybody waiting for root replay to complete
00332       {
00333         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00334         if (root_log_reader_ptr)
00335           Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr, root_log_reader_ptr.get());   
00336         m_root_replay_finished = true;
00337         m_root_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00338       }
00339 
00343       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA;
00344 
00345       // clear the replay map
00346       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00347 
00348       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00349         if (i->table.id == 0 && !(i->range.end_row && !strcmp(i->range.end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)))
00350           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00351       }
00352 
00353       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00354         metadata_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata");
00355         replay_log(metadata_log_reader_ptr);
00356         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
00357       }
00358 
00359       // Create metadata log and wake up anybody waiting for metadata replay to complete
00360       {
00361         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00362         if (metadata_log_reader_ptr)
00363           Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr, metadata_log_reader_ptr.get());
00364         m_metadata_replay_finished = true;
00365         m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00366       }
00367 
00371       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_USER;
00372 
00373       // clear the replay map
00374       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00375 
00376       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00377         if (i->table.id != 0)
00378           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00379       }
00380 
00381       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00382         user_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user");
00383         replay_log(user_log_reader_ptr);
00384         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
00385       }
00386 
00387 
00388       // Create user log and range txn log and
00389       // wake up anybody waiting for replay to complete
00390       {
00391         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00392         Global::user_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user", m_props_ptr, user_log_reader_ptr.get());
00393         Global::range_log = new RangeServerMetaLog(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00394         m_replay_finished = true;
00395         m_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00396       }
00397 
00398     }
00399     else {
00400       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00401 
00406       if (root_log_reader_ptr)
00407         Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr, root_log_reader_ptr.get());
00408 
00409       if (metadata_log_reader_ptr)
00410         Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr, metadata_log_reader_ptr.get());
00411 
00412       Global::user_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user", m_props_ptr, user_log_reader_ptr.get());
00413 
00414       Global::range_log = new RangeServerMetaLog(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00415 
00416       m_root_replay_finished = true;      
00417       m_metadata_replay_finished = true;
00418       m_replay_finished = true;
00419 
00420       m_root_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00421       m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00422       m_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00423     }
00424 
00425   }
00426   catch (Exception &e) {
00427     HT_ERRORF("Problem attempting fast recovery - %s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00428     _exit(1);
00429   }
00430 }

00433 
00434 void RangeServer::replay_log(CommitLogReaderPtr &log_reader_ptr) {
00435   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00436   uint8_t *base;
00437   size_t len;
00438   TableIdentifier table_id;
00439   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00440   const uint8_t *ptr, *end;
00441   int64_t timestamp;
00442   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00443   RangePtr range_ptr;
00444   ByteString key, value;
00445 
00446   while (log_reader_ptr->next((const uint8_t **)&base, &len, &header)) {
00447 
00448     timestamp = header.get_timestamp();
00449 
00450     ptr = base;
00451     end = base + len;
00452 
00453     table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00454 
00455     // Fetch table info
00456     if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_id.id, table_info_ptr))
00457       continue;
00458 
00459     dbuf.ensure(table_id.encoded_length() + 12 + len);
00460     dbuf.clear();
00461 
00462     dbuf.ptr += 4;  // skip size
00463     encode_i64(&dbuf.ptr, timestamp);
00464     table_id.encode(&dbuf.ptr);
00465     base = dbuf.ptr;
00466 
00467     while (ptr < end) {
00468 
00469       // extract the key
00470       key.ptr = ptr;
00471       ptr += key.length();
00472       if (ptr > end)
00473         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
00474 
00475       // extract the value
00476       value.ptr = ptr;
00477       ptr += value.length();
00478       if (ptr > end)
00479         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
00480 
00481       // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
00482       if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(key.str(), range_ptr))
00483         continue;
00484 
00485       // add key/value pair to buffer
00486       memcpy(dbuf.ptr, key.ptr, ptr-key.ptr);
00487       dbuf.ptr += ptr-key.ptr;
00488 
00489     }
00490 
00491     uint32_t block_size = dbuf.ptr - base;
00492     base = dbuf.base;
00493     encode_i32(&base, block_size);
00494 
00495     replay_update(0, dbuf.base, dbuf.fill());
00496   }
00497 }

00500 
00503 void RangeServer::compact(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, uint8_t compaction_type) {
00504   int error = Error::OK;
00505   String errmsg;
00506   TableInfoPtr table_info;
00507   RangePtr range_ptr;
00508   bool major = false;
00509 
00510   // Check for major compaction
00511   if (compaction_type == 1)
00512     major = true;
00513 
00514   if (Global::verbose) {
00515     cout << *table;
00516     cout << *range;
00517     cout << "Compaction type = " << (major ? "major" : "minor") << endl;
00518   }
00519 
00520   if (!m_replay_finished)
00521     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00522 
00526   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info)) {
00527     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00528     errmsg = "No ranges loaded for table '" + (String)table->name + "'";
00529     goto abort;
00530   }
00531 
00535   if (!table_info->get_range(range, range_ptr)) {
00536     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00537     errmsg = (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]";
00538     goto abort;
00539   }
00540 
00541   // schedule the compaction
00542   if (!range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
00543     Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_ptr, major));
00544 
00545   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00546     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00547   }
00548 
00549   if (Global::verbose) {
00550     HT_INFOF("Compaction (%s) scheduled for table '%s' end row '%s'",
00551                 (major ? "major" : "minor"), table->name, range->end_row);
00552   }
00553 
00554   error = Error::OK;
00555 
00556  abort:
00557   if (error != Error::OK) {
00558     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00559     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
00560       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00561     }
00562   }
00563 }

00566 
00570 void RangeServer::create_scanner(ResponseCallbackCreateScanner *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, ScanSpec *scan_spec) {
00571   int error = Error::OK;
00572   String errmsg;
00573   TableInfoPtr table_info;
00574   RangePtr range_ptr;
00575   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00576   bool more = true;
00577   uint32_t id;
00578   Timestamp scan_timestamp;
00579   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00580   ScanContextPtr scan_ctx;
00581 
00582   if (Global::verbose) {
00583     cout << "RangeServer::create_scanner" << endl;
00584     cout << *table;
00585     cout << *range;
00586     cout << *scan_spec;
00587   }
00588 
00589   if (!m_replay_finished)
00590     wait_for_recovery_finish(table, range);
00591 
00592   try {
00593     DynamicBuffer rbuf;
00594 
00595     if (scan_spec->row_intervals.size() > 0) {
00596       if (scan_spec->row_intervals.size() > 1)
00597         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "can only scan one row interval");
00598       if (scan_spec->cell_intervals.size() > 0)
00599         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "both row and cell intervals defined");
00600     }
00601 
00602     if (scan_spec->cell_intervals.size() > 1)
00603       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "can only scan one cell interval");
00604 
00605     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info))
00606       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (String)"unknown table '" + table->name + "'");
00607 
00608     if (!table_info->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00609       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00610                                   (String)"(a) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00611 
00612     schema_ptr = table_info->get_schema();
00613 
00614     range_ptr->get_scan_timestamp(scan_timestamp);
00615 
00616     scan_ctx = new ScanContext(scan_timestamp.logical, scan_spec, range, schema_ptr);
00617 
00618     scanner_ptr = range_ptr->create_scanner(scan_ctx);
00619 
00620     // TODO: fix this kludge (0 return above means range split)
00621     if (!scanner_ptr)
00622       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00623                                   (String)"(b) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00624 
00625     more = FillScanBlock(scanner_ptr, rbuf);
00626 
00627     id = (more) ? Global::scanner_map.put(scanner_ptr, range_ptr) : 0;
00628 
00629     if (Global::verbose) {
00630       HT_INFOF("Successfully created scanner (id=%d) on table '%s'", id, table->name);
00631     }
00632 
00636     {
00637       short moreflag = more ? 0 : 1;
00638       StaticBuffer ext(rbuf);
00639       if ((error = cb->response(moreflag, id, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00640         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00641       }
00642     }
00643   }
00644   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00645     int error;
00646     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00647     if ((error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00648       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00649     }
00650   }
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00654 void RangeServer::destroy_scanner(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t scanner_id) {
00655   HT_INFOF("destroying scanner id=%u", scanner_id);
00656   Global::scanner_map.remove(scanner_id);
00657   cb->response_ok();
00658 }
00659 
00660 
00661 void RangeServer::fetch_scanblock(ResponseCallbackFetchScanblock *cb, uint32_t scanner_id) {
00662   string errmsg;
00663   int error = Error::OK;
00664   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00665   RangePtr range_ptr;
00666   bool more = true;
00667   DynamicBuffer rbuf;
00668 
00669   if (Global::verbose) {
00670     cout << "RangeServer::fetch_scanblock" << endl;
00671     cout << "Scanner ID = " << scanner_id << endl;
00672   }
00673 
00674   if (!Global::scanner_map.get(scanner_id, scanner_ptr, range_ptr)) {
00675     error = Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID;
00676     char tbuf[32];
00677     sprintf(tbuf, "%d", scanner_id);
00678     errmsg = (string)tbuf;
00679     goto abort;
00680   }
00681 
00682   more = FillScanBlock(scanner_ptr, rbuf);
00683 
00684   if (!more)
00685     Global::scanner_map.remove(scanner_id);
00686 
00690   {
00691     short moreflag = more ? 0 : 1;
00692     StaticBuffer ext(rbuf);
00693 
00694     if ((error = cb->response(moreflag, scanner_id, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00695       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00696     }
00697 
00698     if (Global::verbose) {
00699       HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched %d bytes of scan data", ext.size-4);
00700     }
00701   }
00702 
00703   error = Error::OK;
00704 
00705  abort:
00706   if (error != Error::OK) {
00707     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00708     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
00709       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00710     }
00711   }
00712 }
00713 
00714 
00718 void RangeServer::load_range(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier *table, const RangeSpec *range, const char *transfer_log_dir, const RangeState *range_state) {
00719   String errmsg;
00720   int error = Error::OK;
00721   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00722   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00723   RangePtr range_ptr;
00724   string table_dfsdir;
00725   string range_dfsdir;
00726   char md5DigestStr[33];
00727   bool register_table = false;
00728   bool is_root = table->id == 0 && (*range->start_row == 0) && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW);
00729   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00730   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00731   KeySpec key;
00732   String metadata_key_str;
00733 
00734   if (Global::verbose)
00735     cout << "load_range " << *table << " " << *range << endl;
00736 
00737   if (!m_replay_finished)
00738     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00739 
00740   try {
00741 
00743     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00744       table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr);
00745       register_table = true;
00746     }
00747 
00748     // Verify schema, this will create the Schema object and add it to
00749     // table_info_ptr if it doesn't exist
00750     verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation);
00751 
00752     if (register_table)
00753       m_live_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
00754 
00758     if (table_info_ptr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00759       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_ALREADY_LOADED, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00760 
00764     if (!Global::metadata_table_ptr) {
00765       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00766       Global::metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00767     }
00768 
00769     schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
00770 
00776     if (!is_root) {
00777 
00778       metadata_key_str = String("") + (uint32_t)table->id + ":" + range->end_row;
00779 
00783       mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00784 
00785       key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00786       key.row_len = strlen(metadata_key_str.c_str());
00787       key.column_family = "Location";
00788       key.column_qualifier = 0;
00789       key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00790       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()));
00791       mutator_ptr->flush();
00792 
00793     }
00794     else {  //root
00795       uint64_t handle;
00796       HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00797       uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE;
00798 
00799       HT_INFO("Loading root METADATA range");
00800 
00801       try {
00802         handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", oflags, null_callback);
00803         m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "Location", m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()));
00804         m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00805       }
00806       catch (Exception &e) {
00807         HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem setting attribute 'location' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root'" << HT_END;
00808         HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00809         HT_ABORT;
00810       }
00811 
00812     }
00813 
00818     {
00819       assert(*range->end_row != 0);
00820       md5_string(range->end_row, md5DigestStr);
00821       md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00822       table_dfsdir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + (string)table->name;
00823       list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist = schema_ptr->get_access_group_list();
00824       for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin(); ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00825         // notice the below variables are different "range" vs. "table"
00826         range_dfsdir = table_dfsdir + "/" + (*ag_it)->name + "/" + md5DigestStr;
00827         Global::dfs->mkdirs(range_dfsdir);
00828       }
00829     }
00830 
00831     range_ptr = new Range(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr, range, range_state);
00832 
00836     if (table->id == 0) {
00837       if (is_root) {
00838         Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(Global::log_dir + "/root");
00839         Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr);
00840       }
00841       else if (Global::metadata_log == 0) {
00842         Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(Global::log_dir + "/metadata");
00843         Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr);
00844       }
00845     }
00846 
00852     if (transfer_log_dir && *transfer_log_dir) {
00853       int64_t timestamp;
00854       CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, transfer_log_dir);
00855       CommitLog *log;
00856       if (is_root)
00857         log = Global::root_log;
00858       else if (table->id == 0)
00859         log = Global::metadata_log;
00860       else
00861         log = Global::user_log;
00862       
00863       timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
00864       range_ptr->replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp);
00865       if ((error = log->link_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp)) != Error::OK)
00866         HT_THROW(error, (String)"Unable to link transfer log (" + transfer_log_dir + ") into commit log (" + log->get_log_dir().c_str() + ")");
00867     }
00868 
00869     table_info_ptr->add_range(range_ptr);
00870 
00871     if (Global::range_log)
00872       Global::range_log->log_range_loaded(*table, *range, *range_state);
00873 
00874     if (cb && (error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00875       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00876     }
00877     else {
00878       HT_INFOF("Successfully loaded range %s[%s..%s]", table->name, range->start_row, range->end_row);
00879     }
00880 
00881   }
00882   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00883     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00884     if (cb && (error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00885       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00886     }
00887   }
00888 }
00889 
00890 
00891 namespace {
00892 
00893   struct UpdateRec {
00894     const uint8_t *base;
00895     size_t len;
00896   };
00897 
00898   struct SendBackRec {
00899     int error;
00900     uint32_t offset;
00901     uint32_t len;
00902   };
00903 
00904   struct MinTimestampRec {
00905     RangePtr range_ptr;
00906     Timestamp timestamp;
00907   };
00908 }
00909 
00910 
00911 
00915 void RangeServer::update(ResponseCallbackUpdate *cb, TableIdentifier *table, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00916   uint8_t *mod_ptr;
00917   const uint8_t *mod_end;
00918   const uint8_t *add_base_ptr;
00919   const uint8_t *add_end_ptr;
00920   uint8_t *ts_ptr;
00921   const uint8_t auto_ts[8] = { 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff };
00922   string errmsg;
00923   int error = Error::OK;
00924   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00925   int64_t initial_timestamp;
00926   int64_t update_timestamp = 0;
00927   int64_t min_timestamp = 0;
00928   const char *row;
00929   String split_row;
00930   vector<UpdateRec> rootmods;
00931   vector<UpdateRec> gomods;
00932   vector<UpdateRec> splitmods;
00933   UpdateRec update;
00934   CommitLogPtr splitlog;
00935   size_t rootsz = 0;
00936   size_t gosz = 0;
00937   size_t splitsz = 0;
00938   String end_row;
00939   std::vector<MinTimestampRec>  min_ts_vector;
00940   MinTimestampRec  min_ts_rec;
00941   int64_t next_timestamp;
00942   int64_t temp_timestamp;
00943   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00944   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00945   bool split_pending;
00946   ByteString key, value;
00947   bool a_locked = false;
00948   bool b_locked = false;
00949   vector<SendBackRec> send_back_vector;
00950   const uint8_t *send_back_ptr = 0;
00951   uint32_t misses = 0;
00952 
00953   min_ts_vector.reserve(50);
00954 
00955   if (Global::verbose) {
00956     cout << "RangeServer::update" << endl;
00957     cout << *table;
00958   }
00959 
00960   if (!m_replay_finished)
00961     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00962 
00963   initial_timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
00964 
00965   // TODO: Sanity check mod data (checksum validation)
00966 
00967   try {
00968 
00969     // Fetch table info
00970     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00971       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [12], 12);
00972       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
00973       encode_i32(&ptr, Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND);
00974       encode_i32(&ptr, 0);
00975       encode_i32(&ptr, buffer.size);
00976       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find table info for table '%s'", table->name);
00977       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK)
00978         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00979       return;
00980     }
00981 
00982     // verify schema
00983     verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation);
00984 
00985     mod_end = buffer.base + buffer.size;
00986     mod_ptr = buffer.base;
00987 
00988     gomods.clear();
00989 
00990     m_update_mutex_a.lock();
00991     a_locked = true;
00992 
00993     send_back_ptr = 0;
00994 
00995     while (mod_ptr < mod_end) {
00996 
00997       key.ptr = mod_ptr;
00998 
00999       if (*mod_ptr == 0) {
01000         send_back_ptr = mod_ptr;
01001         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)mod_end;
01002         error = Error::BAD_KEY;
01003         break;
01004       }
01005 
01006       row = key.str();
01007 
01008       // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
01009       if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, min_ts_rec.range_ptr)) {
01010         if (send_back_ptr == 0)
01011           send_back_ptr = mod_ptr;
01012         key.next(); // skip key
01013         key.next(); // skip value;
01014         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)key.ptr;
01015         misses++;
01016         continue;
01017       }
01018 
01019       if (send_back_ptr) {
01020         SendBackRec send_back;
01021         send_back.error = Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
01022         send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
01023         send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
01024         send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01025         send_back_ptr = 0;
01026       }
01027 
01028       add_base_ptr = mod_ptr;
01029 
01031       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->increment_update_counter();
01032 
01033       // Make sure range didn't just shrink
01034       if (strcmp(row, (min_ts_rec.range_ptr->start_row()).c_str()) <= 0) {
01035         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01036         continue;
01037       }
01038 
01040       min_timestamp = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_latest_timestamp();
01041 
01043       update_timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
01044 
01045       end_row = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->end_row();
01046 
01048       split_pending = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_split_info(split_row, splitlog);
01049 
01050       splitmods.clear();
01051       splitsz = 0;
01052 
01053       next_timestamp = 0;
01054       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = 0;
01055       min_ts_rec.timestamp.real = update_timestamp;
01056 
01057       while (mod_ptr < mod_end && (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
01058 
01059         // If timestamp value is set to AUTO (zero one's compliment), then assign a timestamp
01060         ts_ptr = mod_ptr + key.length() - 8;
01061         if (!memcmp(ts_ptr, auto_ts, 8)) {
01062           if (next_timestamp == 0)
01063             next_timestamp = update_timestamp;
01064           temp_timestamp = ++next_timestamp;
01065           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
01066             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
01067           Key::encode_ts64(&ts_ptr, temp_timestamp);
01068         }
01069         else {
01070           uint8_t flag = *(ts_ptr-1);
01071           temp_timestamp = Key::decode_ts64((const uint8_t **)&ts_ptr);
01072           if (flag > FLAG_DELETE_CELL && temp_timestamp <= min_timestamp) {
01073             error = Error::RANGESERVER_TIMESTAMP_ORDER_ERROR;
01074             errmsg = (string)"Update timestamp " + (long long)temp_timestamp + " is <= previously seen timestamp of " + (long long)min_timestamp;
01075             min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01076             m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01077             goto abort;
01078           }
01079           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
01080             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
01081         }
01082 
01083         update.base = mod_ptr;
01084         key.next(); // skip key
01085         key.next(); // skip value
01086         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)key.ptr;
01087         update.len = mod_ptr - update.base;
01088         if (split_pending && strcmp(row, split_row.c_str()) <= 0) {
01089           splitmods.push_back(update);
01090           splitsz += update.len;
01091         }
01092         else if (min_ts_rec.range_ptr->is_root()) {
01093           rootmods.push_back(update);
01094           rootsz += update.len;
01095         }
01096         else {
01097           gomods.push_back(update);
01098           gosz += update.len;
01099         }
01100         if (mod_ptr < mod_end)
01101           row = key.str();
01102       }
01103 
01104       add_end_ptr = mod_ptr;
01105 
01106       // force scans to only see updates before the earliest time in this range
01107       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical--;
01108       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add_update_timestamp(min_ts_rec.timestamp);
01109       min_ts_vector.push_back(min_ts_rec);
01110 
01111       if (splitsz > 0) {
01112         DynamicBuffer dbuf(splitsz + table->encoded_length());
01113 
01114         table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01115 
01116         items_added += splitmods.size();
01117         memory_added += splitsz;
01118 
01119         for (size_t i=0; i<splitmods.size(); i++) {
01120           memcpy(dbuf.ptr, splitmods[i].base, splitmods[i].len);
01121           dbuf.ptr += splitmods[i].len;
01122         }
01123 
01124         HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (splitsz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01125 
01126         if ((error = splitlog->write(dbuf, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01127           errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to split log";
01128           m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01129           goto abort;
01130         }
01131       }
01132 
01136       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->lock();
01137       {
01138         uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)add_base_ptr;
01139         while (ptr < add_end_ptr) {
01140           key.ptr = ptr;
01141           ptr += key.length();
01142           value.ptr = ptr;
01143           ptr += value.length();
01144           if ((error = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add(key, value, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01145             SendBackRec send_back;
01146             send_back.error = error;
01147             send_back.offset = key.ptr - buffer.base;
01148             send_back.len = add_end_ptr - key.ptr;
01149             send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01150             break;
01151           }
01152         }
01153       }
01154       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->unlock(update_timestamp);
01155 
01159       if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->maintenance_in_progress()) {
01160         std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData> priority_data_vec;
01161         std::vector<AccessGroup *> compactions;
01162         uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
01163 
01164         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01165         for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01166           disk_usage += priority_data_vec[i].disk_used;
01167           if (!priority_data_vec[i].in_memory && priority_data_vec[i].mem_used >= (uint32_t)Global::access_group_max_mem)
01168             compactions.push_back(priority_data_vec[i].ag);
01169         }
01170 
01171         if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->is_root() &&
01172             (disk_usage > min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_size_limit() ||
01173              (Global::range_metadata_max_bytes && table->id == 0 && disk_usage > Global::range_metadata_max_bytes))) {
01174           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
01175             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(min_ts_rec.range_ptr));
01176         }
01177         else if (!compactions.empty()) {
01178           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance()) {
01179             for (size_t i=0; i<compactions.size(); i++)
01180               compactions[i]->set_compaction_bit();
01181             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(min_ts_rec.range_ptr, false));
01182           }
01183         }
01184       }
01185 
01186       if (Global::verbose) {
01187         HT_INFOF("Added %d (%d split off) updates to '%s'", gomods.size()+splitmods.size(), splitmods.size(), table->name);
01188       }
01189     }
01190 
01191     if (send_back_ptr) {
01192       SendBackRec send_back;
01193       send_back.error = error ? error : Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
01194       error = Error::OK;
01195       send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
01196       send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
01197       send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01198       send_back_ptr = 0;
01199     }
01200 
01201     m_update_mutex_b.lock();
01202     m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01203     b_locked = true;
01204 
01208     if (rootsz > 0) {
01209       DynamicBuffer dbuf(rootsz + table->encoded_length());
01210 
01211       table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01212 
01213       items_added += rootmods.size();
01214       memory_added += rootsz;
01215 
01216       for (size_t i=0; i<rootmods.size(); i++) {
01217         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, rootmods[i].base, rootmods[i].len);
01218         dbuf.ptr += rootmods[i].len;
01219       }
01220 
01221       HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (rootsz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01222 
01223       if ((error = Global::root_log->write(dbuf, initial_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01224         errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to ROOT commit log";
01225         m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01226         goto abort;
01227       }
01228     }
01229 
01233     if (gosz > 0) {
01234       DynamicBuffer dbuf(gosz + table->encoded_length());
01235       CommitLog *log = (table->id == 0) ? Global::metadata_log : Global::user_log;
01236 
01237       table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01238 
01239       items_added += gomods.size();
01240       memory_added += gosz;
01241 
01242       for (size_t i=0; i<gomods.size(); i++) {
01243         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, gomods[i].base, gomods[i].len);
01244         dbuf.ptr += gomods[i].len;
01245       }
01246 
01247       HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (gosz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01248 
01249       if ((error = log->write(dbuf, initial_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01250         errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to commit log (" + log->get_log_dir() + ")";
01251         m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01252         goto abort;
01253       }
01254     }
01255 
01256     m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01257 
01258     if (Global::verbose && misses) {
01259       HT_INFOF("Sent back %d updates because out-of-range", misses);
01260     }
01261 
01262     error = Error::OK;
01263   }
01264   catch (Exception &e) {
01265     HT_ERRORF("Exception caught: %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01266     error = e.code();
01267     errmsg = e.what();
01268     if (b_locked)
01269       m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01270     else if (a_locked)
01271       m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01272   }
01273 
01274   m_bytes_loaded += buffer.size;
01275 
01276  abort:
01277 
01278   Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01279   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01280 
01281   {
01282     uint64_t mt_memory = Global::memory_tracker.get_memory();
01283     uint64_t mt_items = Global::memory_tracker.get_items();
01284     uint64_t vm_estimate = mt_memory + (mt_items*120);
01285     HT_INFOF("drj mem=%lld items=%lld vm-est%lld", mt_memory, mt_items, vm_estimate);
01286   }
01287 
01288   splitlog = 0;
01289 
01290   // unblock scanner timestamp and decrement update counter
01291   for (size_t i=0; i<min_ts_vector.size(); i++) {
01292     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->remove_update_timestamp(min_ts_vector[i].timestamp);
01293     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01294   }
01295 
01296   if (error == Error::OK) {
01300     if (!send_back_vector.empty()) {
01301       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [send_back_vector.size() * 12], send_back_vector.size() * 12);
01302       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
01303       for (size_t i=0; i<send_back_vector.size(); i++) {
01304         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].error);
01305         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].offset);
01306         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].len);
01307       }
01308       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK) {
01309         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01310       }
01311     }
01312     else {
01313       if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
01314         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01315       }
01316     }
01317   }
01318   else {
01319     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
01320     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
01321       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01322     }
01323   }
01324 }
01325 
01326 
01327 
01328 void RangeServer::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table) {
01329   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01330   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vector;
01331   String metadata_prefix;
01332   String metadata_key; // ***********  = String("") + (uint32_t)m_table_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
01333   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
01334   KeySpec key;
01335 
01336   if (Global::verbose) {
01337     HT_INFOF("drop_table '%s'", table->name);
01338     cout << flush;
01339   }
01340 
01341   if (!m_replay_finished)
01342     wait_for_recovery_finish();
01343 
01344   // create METADATA table mutator for clearing 'Location' columns
01345   mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
01346 
01347   // initialize key structure
01348   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
01349   key.column_family = "Location";
01350 
01351   try {
01352 
01353      // For each range in dropped table, Set the 'drop' bit and clear
01354     // the 'Location' column of the corresponding METADATA entry
01355     if (m_live_map_ptr->remove(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01356       metadata_prefix = String("") + table_info_ptr->get_id() + ":";
01357       table_info_ptr->get_range_vector(range_vector);
01358       for (size_t i=0; i<range_vector.size(); i++) {
01359         range_vector[i]->drop();
01360         metadata_key = metadata_prefix + range_vector[i]->end_row();
01361         key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
01362         key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
01363         mutator_ptr->set(key, "!", 1);
01364       }
01365       range_vector.clear();
01366     }
01367     else {
01368       HT_ERRORF("drop_table '%s' id=%u - table not found", table->name, table->id);
01369     }
01370     mutator_ptr->flush();
01371   }
01372   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01373     HT_ERRORF("Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01374     cb->error(e.code(), "Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA");
01375     return;
01376   }
01377 
01378   // write range transaction entry
01379   if (Global::range_log)
01380     Global::range_log->log_drop_table(*table);
01381 
01382   if (Global::verbose) {
01383     HT_INFOF("Successfully dropped table '%s'", table->name);
01384     cout << flush;
01385   }
01386 
01387   cb->response_ok();
01388 }
01389 
01390 
01391 void RangeServer::dump_stats(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01392   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01393   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01394 
01395   HT_INFO("dump_stats");
01396 
01397   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01398 
01399   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++) {
01400     range_vec.clear();
01401     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01402     for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
01403       range_vec[i]->dump_stats();
01404   }
01405   cb->response_ok();
01406 }
01407 
01408 
01412 void RangeServer::replay_begin(ResponseCallback *cb, uint16_t group) {
01413   String replay_log_dir = format("/hypertable/servers/%s/log/replay",
01414                                  m_location.c_str());
01415 
01416   m_replay_group = group;
01417 
01418   if (Global::verbose) {
01419     HT_INFOF("replay_start group=%d", m_replay_group);
01420     cout << flush;
01421   }
01422 
01423   m_replay_log_ptr = 0;
01424 
01425   m_replay_map_ptr->clear_ranges();
01426 
01430   try { Global::log_dfs->rmdir(replay_log_dir); }
01431   catch (Exception &e) {
01432     HT_ERRORF("Problem removing replay log directory: %s", e.what());
01433     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem removing replay log directory: %s",
01434               e.what()));
01435     return;
01436   }
01437 
01441   try { Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(replay_log_dir); }
01442   catch (Exception &e) {
01443     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating replay log directory: %s ", e.what());
01444     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem creating replay log directory: %s",
01445               e.what()));
01446     return;
01447   }
01448 
01449   m_replay_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, replay_log_dir, m_props_ptr);
01450 
01451   cb->response_ok();
01452 }
01453 
01456 void RangeServer::replay_load_range(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier *table, const RangeSpec *range, const RangeState *range_state) {
01457   String errmsg;
01458   int error = Error::OK;
01459   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
01460   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01461   RangePtr range_ptr;
01462   string table_dfsdir;
01463   string range_dfsdir;
01464   bool register_table = false;
01465   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
01466   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
01467   KeySpec key;
01468   String metadata_key_str;
01469 
01470   if (Global::verbose) {
01471     cout << "replay_load_range" << endl;
01472     cout << *table;
01473     cout << *range;
01474     cout << flush;
01475   }
01476 
01477   try {
01478 
01480     if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01481       if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr))
01482         table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr);
01483       else
01484         table_info_ptr = table_info_ptr->create_shallow_copy();
01485       register_table = true;
01486     }
01487 
01488     // Verify schema, this will create the Schema object and add it to
01489     // table_info_ptr if it doesn't exist
01490     verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation);
01491 
01492     if (register_table)
01493       m_replay_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
01494 
01498     if (table_info_ptr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
01499       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_ALREADY_LOADED, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
01500 
01504     if (!Global::metadata_table_ptr) {
01505       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01506       Global::metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
01507     }
01508 
01509     schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
01510 
01511     range_ptr = new Range(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr, range, range_state);
01512 
01513     table_info_ptr->add_range(range_ptr);
01514 
01515     if (Global::range_log)
01516       Global::range_log->log_range_loaded(*table, *range, *range_state);
01517 
01518     if (cb && (error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
01519       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01520     }
01521     else {
01522       HT_INFOF("Successfully replay loaded range %s[%s..%s]", table->name, range->start_row, range->end_row);
01523     }
01524 
01525   }
01526   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01527     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), e.what());
01528     if (cb && (error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
01529       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01530     }
01531   }
01532 }
01533 
01534 
01535 
01536 void RangeServer::replay_update(ResponseCallback *cb, const uint8_t *data, size_t len) {
01537   TableIdentifier table_identifier;
01538   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01539   ByteString key, value;
01540   const uint8_t *ptr = data;
01541   const uint8_t *end_ptr = data + len;
01542   const uint8_t *block_end_ptr;
01543   uint32_t block_size;
01544   size_t remaining = len;
01545   const char *row;
01546   String err_msg;
01547   int64_t timestamp;
01548   RangePtr range_ptr;
01549   String end_row;
01550   uint32_t count;
01551   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
01552   uint64_t items_added = 0;
01553   int error;
01554 
01555   if (Global::verbose) {
01556     HT_INFOF("replay_update - length=%ld", len);
01557     cout << flush;
01558   }
01559 
01560   try {
01561 
01562     while (ptr < end_ptr) {
01563 
01564       // decode key/value block size + timestamp
01565       block_size = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
01566       timestamp = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
01567 
01568       if (m_replay_log_ptr) {
01569         DynamicBuffer dbuf(0, false);
01570         dbuf.base = (uint8_t *)ptr;
01571         dbuf.ptr = dbuf.base + remaining;
01572         if ((error = m_replay_log_ptr->write(dbuf, timestamp)) != Error::OK)
01573           HT_THROW(error, "");
01574       }
01575 
01576       // decode table identifier
01577       table_identifier.decode(&ptr, &remaining);
01578 
01579       if (block_size > remaining)
01580         HT_THROWF(Error::MALFORMED_REQUEST, "Block (size=%lu) exceeds EOM",
01581                   (Lu)block_size);
01582 
01583       block_end_ptr = ptr + block_size;
01584 
01585       // Fetch table info
01586       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_identifier.id, table_info_ptr))
01587         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, "Unable to find "
01588                   "table info for table name='%s' id=%lu",
01589                   table_identifier.name, (Lu)table_identifier.id);
01590 
01591       while (ptr < block_end_ptr) {
01592 
01593         row = ByteString(ptr).str();
01594 
01595         // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
01596         if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, range_ptr))
01597           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, "Unable to find "
01598                     "range for row '%s'", row);
01599 
01600         end_row = range_ptr->end_row();
01601 
01602         key.ptr = ptr;
01603         while (ptr < block_end_ptr &&
01604                (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
01605 
01606           // extract the key
01607           ptr += key.length();
01608 
01609           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01610             HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
01611 
01612           value.ptr = ptr;
01613           ptr += value.length();
01614 
01615           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01616             HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
01617 
01618           HT_EXPECT(range_ptr->replay_add(key, value, timestamp, &count) == Error::OK, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01619 
01620           if (count) {
01621             items_added += count;
01622             memory_added += count * (ptr - key.ptr);
01623           }
01624 
01625           key.ptr = ptr;
01626           if (ptr < block_end_ptr)
01627             row = key.str();
01628         }
01629       }
01630     }
01631 
01632     Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01633     Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01634 
01635   }
01636   catch (Exception &e) {
01637     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
01638     if (cb) {
01639       cb->error(e.code(), format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code())));
01640       return;
01641     }
01642     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
01643   }
01644 
01645   if (cb)
01646     cb->response_ok();
01647 }
01648 
01649 
01650 void RangeServer::replay_commit(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01651   int error;
01652 
01653   if (Global::verbose) {
01654     HT_INFO("replay_commit");
01655     cout << flush;
01656   }
01657 
01658   try {
01659     CommitLog *log = 0;
01660     if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA_ROOT)
01661       log = Global::root_log;
01662     else if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA)
01663       log = Global::metadata_log;
01664     else if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_USER)
01665       log = Global::user_log;
01666 
01667     if ((error = log->link_log(m_replay_log_ptr.get(), Global::user_log->get_timestamp())) != Error::OK)
01668       HT_THROW(error, std::string("Problem linking replay log (") + m_replay_log_ptr->get_log_dir() + ") into commit log (" + log->get_log_dir() + ")");
01669 
01670     m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
01671 
01672   }
01673   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01674     HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
01675     if (cb) {
01676       cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
01677       return;
01678     }
01679     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
01680   }
01681 
01682   if (cb)
01683     cb->response_ok();
01684 }
01685 
01686 
01687 
01688 void RangeServer::drop_range(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range) {
01689   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01690   RangePtr range_ptr;
01691 
01692   if (Global::verbose) {
01693     cout << "drop_range" << endl;
01694     cout << *table;
01695     cout << *range;
01696     cout << flush;
01697   }
01698 
01700   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01701     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, String("No ranges loaded for table '") + table->name + "'");
01702     return;
01703   }
01704 
01706   if (!table_info_ptr->remove_range(range, range_ptr)) {
01707     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
01708     return;
01709   }
01710 
01711   cb->response_ok();
01712 }
01713 
01714 void RangeServer::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01715   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01716   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01717 
01718   (void)cb;
01719 
01720   Global::maintenance_queue->stop();
01721 
01722   // block updates
01723   m_update_mutex_a.lock();
01724   m_update_mutex_b.lock();
01725 
01726   // get the tables
01727   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01728 
01729   // add all ranges into the range vector
01730   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++)
01731     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01732 
01733   // increment the update counters
01734   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
01735     range_vec[i]->increment_update_counter();
01736 
01737   m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
01738 
01739   if (Global::range_log)
01740     Global::range_log->close();
01741 
01742   if (Global::root_log)
01743     Global::root_log->close();
01744 
01745   if (Global::metadata_log)
01746     Global::metadata_log->close();
01747 
01748   if (Global::user_log)
01749     Global::user_log->close();
01750 
01751 }
01752 
01753 
01754 
01755 void RangeServer::verify_schema(TableInfoPtr &table_info_ptr, int generation) {
01756   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_info_ptr->get_name();
01757   DynamicBuffer valbuf;
01758   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
01759   uint64_t handle;
01760   SchemaPtr schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
01761 
01762   if (schema_ptr.get() == 0 || schema_ptr->get_generation() < generation) {
01763 
01764     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
01765 
01766     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf);
01767 
01768     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
01769 
01770     schema_ptr = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(), true);
01771     if (!schema_ptr->is_valid())
01772       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR,
01773                (String)"Schema Parse Error for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' : " + schema_ptr->get_error_string());
01774 
01775     table_info_ptr->update_schema(schema_ptr);
01776 
01777     // Generation check ...
01778     if (schema_ptr->get_generation() < generation)
01779       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH, (String)"Fetched Schema generation for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' is " + schema_ptr->get_generation() + " but supplied is " + generation);
01780   }
01781 
01782 }
01783 
01784 
01785 
01786 void RangeServer::do_maintenance() {
01787   struct timeval tval;
01788 
01792   Global::scanner_map.purge_expired(m_scanner_ttl);
01793 
01797   gettimeofday(&tval, 0);
01798   if ((tval.tv_sec - m_last_commit_log_clean) >= (int)(m_timer_interval*4)/5) {
01799     // schedule log cleanup
01800     Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskLogCleanup(this));
01801     m_last_commit_log_clean = tval.tv_sec;
01802   }
01803 }
01804 
01805 namespace {
01806 
01807   struct LtPriorityData {
01808     bool operator()(const AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData &pd1, const AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData &pd2) const {
01809       return pd1.log_space_pinned >= pd2.log_space_pinned;
01810     }
01811   };
01812 
01813 
01814 }
01815 
01816 
01820 void RangeServer::log_cleanup() {
01821   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01822   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01823   uint64_t prune_threshold;
01824   size_t first_user_table = 0;
01825 
01826   if (!m_replay_finished)
01827     wait_for_recovery_finish();
01828 
01829   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01830 
01831   if (table_vec.empty())
01832     return;
01833 
01837   if (table_vec[0]->get_id() == 0 && Global::metadata_log) {
01838     first_user_table = 1;
01839     table_vec[0]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01840     // skip root
01841     if (!range_vec.empty() && range_vec[0]->end_row() == Key::END_ROOT_ROW)
01842       range_vec.erase(range_vec.begin());
01843     schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(range_vec, Global::metadata_log, m_log_roll_limit);
01844   }
01845 
01846   range_vec.clear();
01847   for (size_t i=first_user_table; i<table_vec.size(); i++)
01848     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01849 
01850   // compute prune threshold
01851   prune_threshold = (uint64_t)((((double)m_bytes_loaded / (double)m_timer_interval) / 1000000.0) * (double)Global::log_prune_threshold_max);
01852   if (prune_threshold < Global::log_prune_threshold_min)
01853     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_min;
01854   else if (prune_threshold > Global::log_prune_threshold_max)
01855     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_max;
01856 
01857   HT_INFOF("Cleaning log (threshold=%lld)", prune_threshold);
01858   cout << flush;
01859 
01860   schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(range_vec, Global::user_log, m_log_roll_limit);
01861 
01862   m_bytes_loaded = 0;
01863 }
01864 
01865 
01866 void RangeServer::schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec, CommitLog *log, uint64_t prune_threshold) {
01867   std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData> priority_data_vec;
01868   LogFragmentPriorityMap log_frag_map;
01869   int64_t timestamp, oldest_cached_timestamp = 0;
01870 
01871   // Load up a vector of compaction priority data
01872   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++) {
01873     size_t start = priority_data_vec.size();
01874     range_vec[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01875     for (size_t j=start; j<priority_data_vec.size(); j++) {
01876       priority_data_vec[j].user_data = (void *)i;
01877       if ((timestamp = priority_data_vec[j].ag->get_oldest_cached_timestamp()) != 0) {
01878         if (oldest_cached_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < oldest_cached_timestamp)
01879           oldest_cached_timestamp = timestamp;
01880       }
01881     }
01882   }
01883 
01884   log->load_fragment_priority_map(log_frag_map);
01885 
01890   for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01891 
01892     if (priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp == 0)
01893       continue;
01894 
01895     LogFragmentPriorityMap::iterator map_iter = log_frag_map.lower_bound(priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp);
01896 
01897     // this should never happen
01898     if (map_iter == log_frag_map.end())
01899       continue;
01900 
01901     if ((*map_iter).second.cumulative_size > prune_threshold) {
01902       if (priority_data_vec[i].mem_used > 0)
01903         priority_data_vec[i].ag->set_compaction_bit();
01904       size_t rangei = (size_t)priority_data_vec[i].user_data;
01905       if (!range_vec[rangei]->test_and_set_maintenance()) {
01906         Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_vec[rangei], false));
01907       }
01908     }
01909   }
01910 
01911   // Purge the commit log
01912   if (oldest_cached_timestamp != 0)
01913     log->purge(oldest_cached_timestamp);
01914 
01915 }
01916 
01917 
01918 
01921 uint64_t RangeServer::get_timer_interval() {
01922   return m_timer_interval*1000;
01923 }
01924 
01925 
01926 void RangeServer::wait_for_recovery_finish() {
01927   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01928   while (!m_replay_finished) {
01929     HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01930     m_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01931   }
01932 }
01933 
01934 
01935 void RangeServer::wait_for_recovery_finish(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range) {
01936   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01937   if (table->id == 0) {
01938     if (!strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)) {
01939       while (!m_root_replay_finished) {
01940         HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for ROOT recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01941         m_root_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01942       }
01943     }
01944     else {
01945       while (!m_metadata_replay_finished) {
01946         HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for METADATA recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01947         m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01948       }
01949     }
01950   }
01951   else {
01952     while (!m_replay_finished) {
01953       HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01954       m_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01955     }
01956   }
01957 }
